creator: Noonification
title: The Noonification: Neuralink: Elon Pledges to Get a Brain Implant (12/14/2022)
content:encoded:
How are you, hacker? 🪐What's happening in tech this week: The Noonification by HackerNoon has got you covered with fresh content from our top 5 stories of the day, every day at noon your local time! Set email preference here. ## Debug Like a Senior Dev: Debugging Program Control Flow By @shai.almog [ 7 Min read ] Control flow is much more than step over. You can jump to arbitrary code offsets while debugging to reproduce elaborate states and behaviors! Read More.

Neuralink: Elon Pledges to Get a Brain Implant

By @valentineenedah [ 2 Min read ] Breaking news: Elon pledges to get a brain implant. Read More.

Introducing EU4UA: A Platform That Helps Ukrainians to Find Housing and Jobs in Europe

By @arthur.tkachenko [ 2 Min read ] EU4UA allows Ukrainian refugees to connect with European citizens willing to provide free emergency accommodation and find a job in no more than a click. Read More. 🧑‍💻 What happened in your world this week?It's been said that writing can help consolidate technical knowledge, establish credibility, and contribute to emerging community standards. Feeling stuck? We got you covered ⬇️⬇️⬇️ ANSWER THESE GREATEST INTERVIEW QUESTIONS OF ALL TIME We hope you enjoy this worth of free reading material. Feel free to forward this email to a nerdy friend who'll love you for it.See you on Planet Internet! With love, The Hacker Noon Team ✌️

title: 先知DEFI交互作业12.14【干货/空投】第323天
content:encoded:
先知每日作业 12.14 进群添加微信号：blockhz 审核 加入先知电报组获取更多信息：https://t.me/seerlabs666 Discord链接：discord.gg/Rv2vn3nn7j

1、ConsenSys的ZKEVM测试网注册 按头冲https://twitter.com/ConsenSys/status/1602675091229507584?s=19

2、Springfield Apes 背后有大佬 可冲 https://www.premint.xyz/mbm-x-springfieldapes/ Use Zero 理念不错 冲一下https://premint.xyz/usezerofinal/ 抽u https://premint.xyz/giveaway1212/ 抽u https://premint.xyz/giveaway1211/

3、link3没照到的填表 https://docs.google.com/forms/u/0/d/e/1FAIpQLSc8Kn3KA4wfQtkulme-DlNf2M7TYZDif05ItQ-eqNwUULYgzw/formResponse

4、逗比国Alpha Call: Murakami Lucky Cat Coin Bank 村上隆猫咪 （买入推荐+分析） 别人的 https://twitter.com/DbgKinggg/status/1602825773856931841

5、速度领啦~ 曼联俱乐部官方推出的首个NFT 免费，免费，免费！传送门 https://collectibles.manutd.com/t=y&utm_source=twitter&utm_medium=video&utm_campaign=collectibles_walletlaunchPost1

6、https://collectibles.manutd.com/?t=y&utm_source=twitter&utm_medium=video&utm_campaign=collectibles_walletlaunchPost1 填个邮箱吧

7、defi项目titi（官方暗示会有空投）：https://mirror.xyz/0x891dDE39445f54bc6f1b73e89398f96e7851B4ba/0Cmb30_vy9eOFmJh0fAO6MCOEP2jpJ_yCgmj5k5v7j0

8、填表申请 https://www.crowdcast.io/e/metamask-community-call-s10/1

9、今天晚上的小狐狸会议 https://www.crowdcast.io/e/metamask-community-call-s10/1

10、L3任务： https://beta.layer3.xyz/bounties/swap-you-stg-to-cake-usdc-liquidity-to-the-stargate-usdc-pool-optimism https://beta.layer3.xyz/quests/crypto-winter

11、biteye 周报 https://mirror.xyz/0x30bF18409211FB048b8Abf44c27052c93cF329F2/Kc5LEsSgxWwU4-_us2wDnHXRNo7ab0b7q6_6JIumBEk

12、namada有活动了！！卷起来 https://twitter.com/namadanetwork/status/1603008146120867854

13、https://app.space.id/profile

14、估值4000万美金的Rage Trade埋伏教程 https://mirror.xyz/0x59FD51f8B0a09e0854f8aA85a954D470237d641D/qdJXq30zQe3lO_1pxy3KtuC_FQ95sN-Swq7FyE_j8oA

15、https://partner.fair.xyz/WeAbove 这个不知道公售有没有机会。free mint 还有这个王老师推荐的狼： https://www.mutantdao.com/mutant-hounds-lair

16、https://magiceden.io/launchpad/eth/infinite_drive_aston_martin 这个我不怎么了解，自己研究吧

If you find submirror valuable, please consider donate to wong2.eth to help cover server cost.
